      • fromFile

        public UniversalEntity fromFile(ContentType contentType,
                                java.io.File file,
                                int chunkSize)
        Returns either the empty entity, if the given file is empty, or a HttpEntity.Default entity consisting of a stream of ByteString instances each containing chunkSize bytes (except for the final ByteString, which simply contains the remaining bytes).

        If the given chunkSize is -1 the default chunk size is used.

        Parameters:
        contentType - (undocumented)
        file - (undocumented)
        chunkSize - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • fromPath

        public UniversalEntity fromPath(ContentType contentType,
                                java.nio.file.Path file,
                                int chunkSize)
        Returns either the empty entity, if the given file is empty, or a HttpEntity.Default entity consisting of a stream of ByteString instances each containing chunkSize bytes (except for the final ByteString, which simply contains the remaining bytes).

        If the given chunkSize is -1 the default chunk size is used.

        Parameters:
        contentType - (undocumented)
        file - (undocumented)
        chunkSize - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        (undocumented)
